title: Welcome to My Blog
author: Ahadizapto
excerpt: This blog is currently under construction. Soon, I'll be sharing insights about web development, DevOps practices, security operations, and my experiences building scalable systems.
content:
Welcome to my technical blog! This is a space where I'll be sharing my experiences, insights, and learnings from the world of web development, DevOps, and security operations.

Over the coming weeks and months, I plan to write about:

  • DevOps Best Practices: CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code, and automation strategies
  • Web Development: Modern frameworks, performance optimization, and design patterns
  • Security Operations: Threat detection, incident response, and security hardening
  • Cloud Architecture: Scalable system design and cloud-native technologies

Stay tuned for more content!
